item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 2:40 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (542 points | 39 comments)
2. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1203 points | 286 comments)
3. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (119 points | 19 comments)
4. DuckDuckGo for Mac is now open source (47 points | 7 comments)
5. Elasticsearch is open source, again (322 points | 187 comments)
6. Google Closure Library has been archived (76 points | 32 comments)
7. I'm blocking connections from AWS to my on-prem services (38 points | 14 comments)
8. Visit Bletchley Park (38 points | 12 comments)
9. Imbue (Formerly Generally Intelligent) (YC S17) Is Hiring a Research Scientist ( | hide)
10. JPMorgan's Python training for business analysts and traders (62 points | 24 comments)
11. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (298 points | 137 comments)
12. Build an Infinite Canvas (41 points | 4 comments)
13. SDL3 new GPU API merged (61 points | 23 comments)
14. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (112 points | 44 comments)
15. Show HN: Amine – Prevents you from switching 100s of Browser Tabs (12 points | discuss)
16. Firewall rules: not as secure as you think (44 points | 25 comments)
17. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (185 points | 25 comments)
18. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (226 points | 369 comments)
19. Colorful Ribbon Diagrams Became the Face of Proteins (5 points | discuss)
20. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (117 points | 24 comments)
21. Mastering ISO 8583 Message Networking with Golang (15 points | 4 comments)
22. Show HN: MinutesLink – AI note taker for online calls (10 points | 3 comments)
23. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (838 points | 281 comments)
24. The Imperial Origins of Big Data (13 points | 3 comments)
25. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (327 points | 377 comments)
26. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (144 points | 34 comments)
27. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (75 points | 25 comments)
28. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (302 points | 82 comments)
29. Californians can now add their mobile driver's license to Google Wallet (18 points | 12 comments)
30. Show HN: Homemade automated solar concentrator (258 points | 67 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 2:40 AM UTC
